form.label: Certificate Overview
form.description: This dashboard shows details around SSL/TLS certificates detected in the environment by Greenbone Vulnerability Manager.

viz.title: Note: You can use your mouse to pan/zoom the visualization.

search.query:
`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` signature="SSL/TLS:*" | rex field="result.description" "[\s,:]+(?CN=.*?)\s+(Signature|key-size|public key size|subject|\(Server certificate\)|Certificate)" | rex field="result.description" "(\(serial:issuer\):|\|)\s+(?\w+)(:|\s(subject|signature algorithm))" | rex field="result.description" "valid until\s+\|\s+(?[\d\-:\s]+)\sUTC" | search certificate=* | eval names = if(len(certificate) > 40, substr(certificate, 1, 40) + "...", certificate) | eval tooltip = "Serial: " + serial + "
Valid Until: " + valid_until | rename certificate as path | stats latest(valid_until) as valid_until by path, dest, dest_ip, names, tooltip | appendpipe [ eval path = path + "/" + dest | eval tooltip = "IP Address: " + dest_ip + "
Valid Until: " + valid_until | stats latest(valid_until) as valid_until by path, tooltip ] | table path, names, tooltip, valid_until | eval status = if(now() > strptime(valid_until, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "Expired", "Valid") | eval color = case(status == "Expired", "#D41F1F", status=="Valid", "#53963E", true(), "#82CAFA")

`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` signature="SSL/TLS:*" | rex field="result.description" "[\s,:]+(?<certificate>CN=.*?)\s+(Signature|key-size|public key size|subject|\(Server certificate\)|Certificate)" | rex field="result.description" "(\(serial:issuer\):|\|)\s+(?<serial>\w+)(:|\s(subject|signature algorithm))" | rex field="result.description" "valid until\s+\|\s+(?<valid_until>[\d\-:\s]+)\sUTC" | search certificate=* | stats latest(_time) as lastTime latest(valid_until) as valid_until values(dest) as dest by certificate, serial, dest_ip, result.port | eval status = if(now() > strptime(valid_until, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "Expired", "Valid") | eval lastTime = strftime(lastTime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table status, certificate, serial, dest, dest_ip, result.port, lastTime, valid_until | rename certificate as Certificate, serial as Serial, dest as Asset, dest_ip as "IP Address", result.port as Port, lastTime as "Last seen", valid_until as "Valid Until", status as Status
